articles.description: The Hindi film industry saw a significant revival in 2023 with big blockbusters and actor comebacks. Major releases included 'Gadar 2', 'Animal', 'Pathaan', and 'Jawan', with actors Shah Rukh Khan, Ranbir Kapoor, and the Deol family making significant comebac…
articles.content: 2023 was a good year for Hindi film cinema. After a lull in 2021 and 2022, the industry was back with a bang as big blockbusters like ‘Gadar 2’, ‘Animal’, ‘Pathaan’ and ‘Jawan’ brought in huge revenu… [+5569 chars]
